about_the_game:
Evolution Tag 2 is an online multiplayer MOBA game where you can evolve! Evolve your character to grow stronger and choose from many different evolution paths. You can become a builder that can construct a base / train an army, an ice wizard that can freeze enemies, and much more!

The game is currently in alpha and features three different game modes:

Classic Mode - Fight other players in a 10 vs 5 match between humans and the undead. The goal of the human team is survive, grow stronger, and eventually destroy the undead base. While the undead team which starts out much stronger has to hunt down the other team and knock out each player two times.

Survival Mode - Go solo or team up with up to 7 other players and try to survive 23 waves of enemies.

RPG Mode - Explore and fight monsters in this multiplayer RPG mode with a fully adjustable camera. Each game, you start out as a turnip and evolve you character as usual. But you can collect monster drops, gain experience, and spend attribute points to permanently make your account stronger.

Note: To save money, game servers are usually only online during play test events or on random weekends. So the download button will be disabled unless there's an upcoming play test. Feel free to join the discord for more information. Thanks!

name: Evolution Tag 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A unique twist on the MOBA genre. Evolve, survive, build bases, control armies, and fight other players in an intense 10vs5 match between humans and the undead. Or try out a multiplayer PvE game mode where you must survive against 23 waves of enemies.
